/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees on both sides, their leaves forming a canopy that filters the sunlight. The sun shines brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow over the scene. In the distance, a river can be seen, adding a serene element to the urban landscape. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
